dmca.title: marsexploratorium.com
dmca.body:
Hello-
 
I am looking for the owner of marsexploratorium.com. Our reports show you as the registered domain name holder of this website. We are seeking the owner to request that he cease usage of the word Exploratroium, due to the Exploratorium having trademark rights here in the US and abroad. We are a non-profit organization and respectfully request your site to be renamed. We understand that you may only be the web designer for your client and would like to request contact with your client. Please contact me anytime to answer your questions or concerns.
 
Best Regards,
 
Aaron N. Chirolo
Project Assistant
Exploratorium
3601 Lyon Street
San Francisco, CA  94123
(415) 353-0456
achirolo@exploratorium.edu
 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Dear Sir or Madam:         

 

We have recently learned that you or your client is using the name "Mars Exporatorium" to describe your Website or and the domain name www.marsexploratorium.com . The Exploratorium has established a strong presence on the Internet through our award-winning World Wide Web home page and has registered "exploratorium.edu",   "exploratorium.org", "exploratorium.net" and "exploratorium.com" with the Network Information Center.  Our on-line Exploratorium Store
